about_the_game:
**Once you purchase this DLC, log into Freestyle 2 and check your Gift Box. **
**Please consider carefully when you are purchasing the DLC, the items cannot be refunded **
**Refunds and Chargebacks are against our Freestyle 2's User Agreement. **
If you have failed to receive the item after purchase, please contact Freestyle 2 **


Freestyle2 - Welcome Special Package

DLC Content:
  • Card Balls * 50
  • 250 Freestyle Tickets
  • Reset Training * 1
  • VIP Membership (30 Days Limited time)
  • Double Up Sponsor (30 Days Limited time)
  • BUFF Skill Slots * 2 (30 Days Limited time)

Check out your Card Balls at M. Ball -> 2nd Row Card Balls!


DLC Descriptions:
Welcome! Are you new to Freestyle 2? This package will provide you various items that will start up your first move to Freestyle 2!
A DLC package that contains 50 Card Balls, VIP Membership (30D), Reset Training, 250 Freestyle Ticket, D-Up Sponsor (30D), and 2 BUFF Skill slots (30D).

Open 50 Card Balls and gather Card Sets. Cards will enable you to have more attributes!
250 Freestyle Tickets will fulfill the conditions to level up your Freestyle skills!
Don't worry if you have picked the wrong attributes! Use the Reset Training to reset your training attribute points and select them again!
Try out the Limited Time use items! They will make you to have more benefits!

Check them out now on Freestyle 2!

If you were not able to receive the DLC, please logout and login again.
if you still didn't get your DLC, please send us an Email.

Please follow the instruction in the Getting Started Manual. (** Guide images may contain a different package image)
Find the Getting Started Manual at Quick Reference. which is placed on the right hand side of the page.

name: Freestyle2 - Welcome Special Package

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Window XP
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Window 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE 9800 GT 1GB or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

A DLC package that contains 50 Card Balls, VIP Membership (30D), Reset Training, 250 Freestyle Ticket, D-Up Sponsor (30D), and 2 BUFF Skill slots (30D).
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Thai, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
